scripts.server1: cd Server && cd CartService && npm start
scripts.server2: cd Server && cd CustomerService && npm start
scripts.server3: cd Server && cd MovieService && npm start
scripts.server4: cd Server && cd ReservationService && npm start
scripts.server5: cd Server && cd TheaterService && npm start
